title: Smart Water Bottle

title: iphone 16 Pro Max

title: Portable Air Purifier
description: Compact and efficient, the portable air purifier removes dust, allergens, and odors with advanced HEPA filtration. Ideal for home, office, or travel, ensuring fresh and clean air wherever you go.

title: Gaming Laptop

title: Smart watch
description: Stylish smartwatch that tracks fitness, heart rate, and notifications, keeping you connected on the go. With customizable watch faces and long battery life, its perfect for both workouts and daily wear.

description: Brew barista-quality coffee at home.

title: USB-C Hub
description: Versatile USB-C hub that expands your device's connectivity with multiple ports for USB, HDMI, and SD cards. Compact and portable design makes it perfect for home, office, or travel, enhancing your productivity effortlessly.

title: Noise Cancelling Earplugs
description: Comfortable noise-cancelling earplugs designed to block out disruptive sounds for better focus and relaxation. Ideal for sleeping, studying, or traveling, they provide a peaceful environment wherever you go.

description: Powerful rechargeable flashlight with adjustable brightness and durable construction for reliable performance in any situation. Compact and portable design makes it perfect for camping, emergencies, or everyday use.

title: Smart Plug
description: Convenient smart plug that allows you to control devices remotely via smartphone or voice assistant. Schedule timers and monitor energy usage, making your home smarter and more energy-efficient.
